extension.description: Extension that recognizes and makes foldable logic blocks in RPG and RPGLE, such as IF/ENDIF (all types of IF), DO/ENDDO, BEGSR/ENDSR, and more.
config.title: RPG Folding
config.enableFreeForm.description: Enable free-form fallback (deprecated). Use another extension for free-form RPGLE folding.
config.colorPickerInfo.markdownDescripti: Open the [color picker](https://www.google.com/search?q=color+picker) to choose a color, then paste the hex code into the extension settings.
config.colorPickerInfo.description: Info: opens an external link to obtain a hex color code to paste into the settings.
config.highlight.enable.description: Enable persistent highlighting of RPG block keywords (start/end/else).
config.highlight.blockKeywordColor.descr: Hex color used for block keywords (start/end). Default: mustard yellow.
config.highlight.elseColor.description: Hex color used for ELSE/ELSEIF lines. Default: light orange.
config.highlight.matchLineColor.descript: Background color used to highlight matching start/end lines when the cursor is on a block keyword (light translucent blue).
config.highlight.matchElseLineColor.desc: Background color used to highlight ELSE/ELSEIF lines of the matched IF (light translucent orange).
config.highlight.callColor.description: Color used for the CALL/CALLP keyword (foreground, default purple).
config.highlight.onlyColumn26.descriptio: When true, keywords are highlighted only if they start exactly at column 26 (index 25). When false, highlighting occurs wherever the keyword appears on the line.
command.pinBlockHighlight.title: Pin block highlight
command.unpinBlockHighlight.title: Unpin block highlight
